comments.body: @liggitt  unit test for use case `B` - request with longer timeout is allowed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +158,162 @@			requestURL:               fmt.Sprintf("/api/v1/namespaces?timeout=%s", requestTimeoutMaximum+time.Second),
			longRunning:              false,
			statusCodeExpected:       http.StatusOK,
			handlerCallCountExpected: 1,
			hasDeadlineExpected:      true,
